level.heading: Second degree child sexual abuse.
level.text: Whoever, being at least 4 years older than a child, engages in sexual contact with that child or causes that child to engage in sexual contact shall be imprisoned for not more than 10 years and, in addition, may be fined in an amount not to exceed $100,000.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-257, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 22-3001.
